imdb.plot outline: Yen Phuong (Nha Phuong) is a young girl, beautiful and musically gifted. Ironically, The XP disease - a rare disease of the skin caused her to not be exposed to sunlight. Method only see daylight images through what Quyen (Hoang Oanh) - her friend recorded, and then have to wait until night falls can out to the outside world. Mrs Khanh ( Thu Ha) - The mother - is a gentle and embroidery artisans of all loving children. Living in the disease and the door slammed future may at any time, Phuong still very optimistic, love life and dreams could once on stage performing songs composed by him. Phuong met Quan (Quang Tuan) - a cool guy, careless life. From the first impression hardly nice, Quan gradually felt fascinated by the pure innocence and energy of Phuong. Meanwhile, Phuong also noticed, the moment with Quan was the happiest moment to date her. But life is not easy, especially for someone with serious illnesses such as Phuong. As has overcome many obstacles in love with Quan, and received an invitation to Japan performances, Phuong had to stand in front of the most difficult choices in life: to shine on stage only once or continue healing raise hopes but never sing again.
imdb.title: Khuc Hat Mat Troi
plot: Yen Phuong (Nha Phuong) is a young girl, beautiful and musically gifted. Ironically, The XP disease - a rare disease of the skin caused her to not be exposed to sunlight.::junglmh
